H0.text: In which stretch of water did the Mary Rose actually sink. English Channel

H1.text: In which stretch of water did the Mary Rose actually sink. Thames Estuary

H2.text: In which stretch of water did the Mary Rose actually sink. Irish Sea

H3.text: In which stretch of water did the Mary Rose actually sink. Solent

A4.text: She sank off Spithead in the Solent, the strait north of the Isle of Wight.
